name: Deadman Winterland
description:
http://nyupoly.azurewebsites.net/

Player 1: Move with Arrow Keys (Up, Left, Right)

Get all of the coins and don't die.

Player 2: Click objects with your cursor (Mouse)

Click the icicles and the platforms and kill player 1 before he collects all of the coins.

After someone wins, reset by pressing down.

Have Fun!

Made by Timothy Seid, Jonghun (Peter) Pak, Kevin Peng, Angela Wu, Simon Chen, & Matthew Chu
